sys_script_include.name: lmsAjax

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_c58b0e442f122010bd46bea62799b667
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_393895_lms.lmsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>lmsAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var lmsAjax = Class.create();
lmsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getDateDiff : function() {
		// capture the values of start & end date by first of all creating the glidedate object
		var d1 = new GlideDate(); 
		d1.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_start'));
		var d2 = new GlideDate(); 
		d2.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_end'));
		
		// calculate duration
		var duration = GlideDate.substract(d1, d2); 
		return duration.getNumericValue();
	},
	
    type: 'lmsAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-08 10:09:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>c58b0e442f122010bd46bea62799b667</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>lmsAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_393895_lms">2b35b3772f312010bd46bea62799b640</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">2b35b3772f312010bd46bea62799b640</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c58b0e442f122010bd46bea62799b667</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-08 10:09:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
